title: Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Drops by -2.05%
text:
Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Drops by -2.05% Company Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Drops by -2.05% October 5, 2015 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) has dropped 2.05% during the past week, however, the bigger picture is still very bullish; the shares have posted positive gains of 8.23% in the last 4 weeks. The shares have underperformed the S&P 500 by 3.05% during the past week but S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) has outperformed the index in 4 weeks by 6.56%. 
Shares of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) ended Friday session in red amid volatile trading. The shares closed down 0.37 points or 1.14% at $32.08 with 97,231 shares getting traded. Post opening the session at $32.02, the shares hit an intraday low of $30.95 and an intraday high of $32.17 and the price vacillated in this range throughout the day. The company has a market cap of $1,117 million and the number of outstanding shares have been calculated to be 34,812,000 shares. The 52-week high of S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) is $33.14 and the 52-week low is $23.07. 
The company shares have rallied 34.9% in the past 52 Weeks. On September 25, 2015 The shares registered one year high of $33.14 and one year low was seen on October 8, 2014 at $23.07. The 50-day moving average is $30.68 and the 200 day moving average is recorded at $29.39. S&P 500 has rallied 0.84% during the last 52-weeks. 
On a different note, The Company has disclosed insider buying and selling activities to the Securities Exchange, The Securities and Exchange Commission has divulged that Hostetter Jerry Delmar, director of S&T Bancorp Inc, had unloaded 5,500 shares at an average price of $31.95 in a transaction dated on September 17, 2015. The total value of the transaction was worth $175,725. Currently the company Insiders own 2.7% of S&T Bancorp Inc. Company shares. In the past six months, there is a change of -9.43% in the total insider ownership. Institutional Investors own 49.1% of Company shares. During last 3 month period, 4.98% of total institutional ownership has changed in the company shares. S&T Bancorp Inc. is up 8.87% in the last 3-month period. Year-to-Date the stock performance stands at 9.68%. 
S&T Bancorp, Inc. (S&T) is a bank holding company and has three wholly owned subsidiaries, S&T Bank, 9th Street Holdings, Inc. and STBA Capital Trust I. The Company also owns certain interest in Commonwealth Trust Credit Life Insurance Company. As of December 31, 2012, the Company had approximately $3.4 billion in loans and $3.6 billion in deposits. S&T Bank is a full service bank. It provides its services to its customers through offices located in Allegheny, Armstrong, Blair, Butler, Cambria, Clarion, Clearfield, Indiana, Jefferson and Westmoreland counties of Pennsylvania. It operates in three segments: Community Banking, Wealth Management and Insurance. Its Community Banking segment offers services, which include accepting time and demand deposit accounts, originating commercial and consumer loans, and providing letters of credit and credit card services. The Wealth Management segment offers discount brokerage services, services as executor and trustee under wills and deeds.
